es.csic.iiia.nsm.norm.evaluation

Class Utility

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.csic.iiia.nsm.norm.evaluation.Utility

  • public class Utility
extends java.lang.Object
    The utility of a norm, that may have utility with respect to several dimensions and goals, and hence may be evaluated in terms of several dimensions and goals
    Author:
    "Javier Morales (jmorales@iiia.csic.es)"
    See Also:
    Dimension, Goal
